SELECT orderform.*, SUM(orderformdetail.orderdetail_price) AS total_price FROM orderform JOIN orderformdetail ON orderform.orderform_num = orderformdetail.orderform_num GROUP BY orderform.orderform_num;
SELECT quotation.*, SUM(quotationdetail.quotdetail_price) AS total_price FROM quotation JOIN quotationdetail ON quotation.quot_num = quotationdetail.quot_num GROUP BY quotation.quot_num;

SELECT *, concat('quot', quot_num) as this_num
FROM quotation GROUP BY quotation.quot_num union ALL SELECT *, concat('order', orderform_num) as this_num FROM orderform GROUP BY orderform.orderform_num;
